analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/21/0x6118aee7cd5df23133a80169a0e2e5e7f1d86ab8.sol:
	Contract iConsortCandyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/21/0x6118aee7cd5df23133a80169a0e2e5e7f1d86ab8.sol#130-132)
	 - getTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0x6118aee7cd5df23133a80169a0e2e5e7f1d86ab8.sol#133-147)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

iConsortCandyToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/21/0x6118aee7cd5df23133a80169a0e2e5e7f1d86ab8.sol#61-63) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/21/0x6118aee7cd5df23133a80169a0e2e5e7f1d86ab8.sol#36)
